comments.body: Enc in rr closed at 3.7k in 2nd round last year. You might get aiml in EC campus , it's opening this year
What campus is better rr or ec for me ec campus is too far which campus do you recommend to go to
Check out the campus videos on YouTube. And prefer branch over campus, if you don't like enc don't take it.

Thank you but if i get only ece in rr or ec campus what are my chances to change my branch to cse. I understand that i need to cross a min cgpa of 9.5 is it feasible to change branch if i get ece or eee.
From what seniors have told here , branch change is almost impossible and only 2-3 kids switch branches
